headline: Chart Industries Shareholders Vote Up Baker Hughes Takeover
summary: 'With the pending acquisition of Chart, we are undertaking a comprehensive evaluation of our capital allocation focus, business, cost structure and operations'.

raw.headline: Chart Industries Shareholders Vote Up Baker Hughes Takeover
raw.summary: 'With the pending acquisition of Chart, we are undertaking a comprehensive evaluation of our capital allocation focus, business, cost structure and operations'.

headline: Chart shareholders approve $13.6bn acquisition by Baker Hughes
summary: The acquisition is part of Baker Hughes’ strategy to enhance its position as a provider of energy and industrial solutions.

raw.headline: Chart shareholders approve $13.6bn acquisition by Baker Hughes
raw.summary: The acquisition is part of Baker Hughes’ strategy to enhance its position as a provider of energy and industrial solutions.
